```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(plotly)
library(tidyr)
penguins 
```

```{r}
penguins %>% drop_na()

ariel <- list(
  family = "Ariel",
  size = 14,
  color = "black")
arielTitle <- list(
  family = "Ariel",
  size = 16,
  color = "black")
colorMap <- c("#156082", "#E97132", "#196B24")
colorMap <- setNames(colorMap, c("Adelie", "Chinstrap", "Gentoo"))
fig <- plot_ly(data = penguins, type="scatter", opacity=0.8, mode="markers", x = ~flipper_length_mm, y = ~body_mass_g, color = ~species, colors = colorMap, marker = list(size=~bill_length_mm*0.3)) %>% layout(font = ariel, title = list(text = 'Flipper Length vs. Body Mass\nFor Adelie, Chinstrap, and Gentoo Penguins', font = arielTitle), xaxis = list(title = 'Flipper Length (mm)'), yaxis = list(title = 'Body Mass (g)'), legend = list(title=list(text='Species')))

fig

```
